description:
AJYV-09 EMBROIDERED CHIFFON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Chiffon Trouser: Twisted Silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Green

Clad in the emerald depths of a royal garden, this ensemble transforms you into a queen. The embroidered Peshwas, an epitome of regalia, is adorned with antique golden vines in the form of dori that wind through crimson threads, sparkling with sequined dewdrops of gold. The black dupatta, a night sky above the garden, completes this regal vision, making a statement that echoes through the night.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front bodice with neckline on chiffon
Embroidered back bodice with neckline on chiffon
1.25 meter embroidered border for bodice hem on chiffon
18 embroidered kalis for peshwas on chiffon
4 meter embroidered border for hemline on chiffon
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta on chiffon with 2 side borders
1.5 meter dyed wide with twisted silk for trouser
